projects.name: Training Self-driving car
projects.short: Collected image data by driving a race car in a simulation game. Then used the data to train a Convolutional Neural Network model. The model can drive by itsel in the game.
videos: <iframe width="1200" height="900" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/5R_c7XdWmZg" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

projects.name: Fire-response-time
projects.short: Portland Fire & Rescue supplied fire dispatch data for year 2010-2016. I did some exporatory analysis and built an interactive app on Heroku.
